title: Will every Man in Paradise have 2 Wives & 72 Hoor Al Ayn? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says that is it true that every man in paradise will have 72 maidens her and two wives the answer is no this is not true at all every man would have two wives in paradise and if you do the math you will find throughout history that women are always more than men as for the 72 this is only and specifically for those who are martyred on the battlefield who who die as a shaheed on the battlefield and this is a gift from allah
